headline.main: PRESIDENT URGED TO END HITLER PERIL; 1,000 at Rally Ask Use of Navy to Win Battle of Atlantic

lead_paragraph: Although the weather kept attendance to below 1,000, a Stop Hitler First Rally was held at Manhattan Center last night by the Union for Democratic Action, with the cooperation of the Fight for Freedom Committee and the New York Chapter of the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies.
abstract: Backs U S mil force use in Eur war
